title: [1.7-1.8][32x][JXZ搬运][永久更新]TouHouCraft 东方众快进来吧！
author: jjxxz2
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jjxxz2 于 2014-9-17 16:37 编辑 

图片：








更多图片：






















已替换物品/生物列表：
原文：
Weapons/Tools:
Wooden Sword = Kanako's Onbashira
Stone Sword = Nue's trident
Iron Sword = Youmu's sword
Gold Sword = Tenshi's Sword
Diamond Sword = Cirno's Icicle sword
Bow = Eirn's Bow
Arrow = Eirn's Arrows
Shot Arrows = Danmaku

Items:
Fishing Rod = Yukkuri Fishing Rod
Egg = Mystia Egg
Snowball = Frozen Frog
Firecharge = Those big red bullet things.
Endereye thing = Okuu's sun thing.
Exp Orbs = Power Ups
Gold Nugget = Komachi Coins
Blaze Rod = Okuu's Control Rod
Exp Bottle = UFO
Bucket of milk = Suika's bottle
Stone Hoe = Nazrin's hook thing
Flint and Steel = Marisa's Hakkero
Leather vest = PADS
Rotten flesh = Yoshika head
Books = Alice's Grimoire
Golden apple = Bad apple
Cauldron = Kisume's Bucket
Throwing Potions = Shanghai
The Writable Books = Alice's Grimoire + Shanghai
Sponge = Nazrin Cheese
Mushroom Soup/Bowl = Yuugi's Shake
Ghast Tear = Orin's Floating Skulls
Potions = Yin Yang
Iron chestplate = Okuu eye
Ender Pearls= Okuu bullet
Enchanted Book = Patchy's book

Mobs:
Zombies = Yoshika
Silverfish = Myons
Sheep = Mokou
Slime = Yukkuri
Squid = Suwako Hat
Ghast = Bakebake

Music Records: 
13 = Flandre Remix
Blocks = Rika Remix[/quote]
[/spoiler]
以下是翻译 ，感谢用户Aizu帮忙翻译

木剑 = 神奈子的御柱

金剑 = 天子的剑
钻石剑 =琪露诺的冰翅膀
弓 = 永琳的弓
箭 = 永琳的箭
在空中的箭 = 弹幕

Items:
鱼竿 = 油库里鱼竿
蛋 = 小碎骨蛋【233
雪球 = 冻青蛙
Firecharge = 红玉

经验球 = P点
金粒= 小町的硬币
烈焰棒 = 阿空的制御棒
附魔瓶 = UFO
牛奶桶 = 萃香的酒葫芦
石锄 = 娜兹玲的那啥东西
打火石 = 魔理沙的八卦炉
皮革背心 = PADS【斜眼
腐肉 = 芳香的脑袋←好可怕
书 = 爱丽丝的魔法书
金苹果 = Bad apple ←神曲
炼药锅 = 琪斯美的桶
溅射药水 = 上海
可写书 = 爱丽丝的魔法书+上海
海绵 = 纳兹林奶酪wwww
蘑菇煲 = 勇仪的酒
恶魂之泪 = 阿燐的灵
药水 = 阴阳玉
铁胸甲 = 八咫乌之眼

附魔书 = 姆Q的书

生物：
僵尸 = 宫古芳香【确实是僵尸
蠹虫 = 饼梦
羊 = 藤原妹红【居然不是鸡
史莱姆 = 油库里【这个还说的过去
鱿鱼 = 诹访子帽子【诹访子本体
Ghast = Bakebake

音乐唱片:
13 = 芙兰朵露BGM【好鬼畜
Blocks = 里香BGM【黑历史时期



从没人看的更新日志：
===== UPDATE 8/2/2014 =====
- Updated for 1.8
- Added 8 splash text
- Changed golden hoe to kaguya's candy stick thing
- Did wet sponge
- Did coarse_dirt
- Did daylight_detector_inverted_top
- Did all the red sandstones
- other things

===== UPDATE 5/22/2014 =====
Added NormapMaps and SpecularMaps for most blocks.
===== UPDATE 5/19/2014 =====
- Added 45 splash text
- Did background music for The End.
- Did a title screen music. Iris remix.
- HD font is back. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Natural textures option is back. (requires Optifine)
- Connected glass works again. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Changed redstone light color.(requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Connected bookshelf works again. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Did night sky (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Did world lighting (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Did lead line (requires MCpatcher)
- Did fishing line (requires MCpatcher)
- Did fence (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Did wooden button (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Did quiver = When 5 or more arrows are stacked, they become a quiver (requires MCpatcher)
- Added 5 random blocks to sand. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added 5 random blocks to tallgrass. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added 4 random block to grass. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added 3 random blocks to deadbush. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added 9 random blocks to waterlily. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added extra blocks based on the height of bamboo. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added extra blocks based on the height of iron_bars. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added extra blocks based on the height of sandstone. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added extra blocks based on the height of quartz_block_lines. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added extra blocks based on the height of stained glass. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Added chat icons. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher) ? = Chen ? = Circle 9 ? = Helix ? = Yukkuri ? = Mystia
- Changed birch leaves to cherry blossom leaves. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Changed water color based on biome. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Changed fog color based on biome. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Changed sky color based on biome. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Changed underwater color based on biome. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Dirt has grass borders (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Did a 3D model for ladders (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Did a 3D model for rail (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Did a 3D model for activator rail (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Did a 3D model for detector rail (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Did a 3D model for power rail (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Did a 3D model for stone_slab (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Did a 3D model for reeds (requires Minecraft 1.8)
- Made End background darker
- Removed that annoying clickclick sound.
- Change the volume on the Rika remix so people do go deaf.
- Added the missing potion icons
- Did moon phases
- Did little water/lava particles
- Did coal_block
- Did hay_block
- Did daylight_detector
- Did Slime block
- Did stone_andesite
- Did stone_andesite_smooth
- Did stone_diorite
- Did stone_diorite_smooth
- Did stone_granite
- Did stone_granite_smooth
- Did hotbar
- Did signs
- Did the little arrows for resource packs
- Did water
- Did lava
- Did string
- Did bat - Are now Remilia bats.
- Did bat2 - Are Flandre bats. (requires Optifine or MCpatcher)
- Improved health hearts
- Improved bamboo
- Improved log_jungle
- Improved log_birch
- Improved cauldron
- Improved glowstone
- Improved sponge
- Improved brick
- Improved log_acacia
- Improved log_oak
- Improved log_spruce
- Improved log_big_oak
- Improved nether_brick
- Improved stone_slab
- Improved stonebrick
- Improved stonebrick_cracked
- Improved stonebrick_mossy
- Improved sandstone
- Improved bedrock
- Improved planks_oak
- Improved planks_birch
- Improved planks_spruce
- Improved planks_jungle
- Improved planks_acacia
- Improved planks_big_oak
- Improved torch
- Improved flower_oxeye_daisy
- Improved all the tulips
- Improved sand
- Improved flower_pot
- Improved chest
- Improved diamond_block
- Improved red sand
- Improved cobblestone_mossy
- Improved rain
- Improved quartz_block_lines
- Improved gravel
- Improved cobblestone
- Improved door
- Changed creative menu colors.
- Fixed Redtorch on/off
- Fixed Nue's Trident animation
- Added some new paintings.
- Updated title screen.
- Gave Touhou items their proper names.
- Cut a lot of stuff that wasn't needed to reduce the file size. 36mbs to 25mbs.
- Other little things i don't feel like listing.



我翻墙搬运这么辛苦，快给我加点人气吧！












你说我落掉了什么？

replies.author: jjxxz2
replies.txt_content:
[蕾米]leimi 发表于 2013-11-13 00:01 
油库里.
其实下过来之后你完全无法直视油库里（史莱姆）的正面
总体来说还是挺不错的。东方化的东西倒挺多。（油库里满满的恶意）另外。药水什么的看着真蛋疼。。

replies.author: Aizu
replies.txt_content: 没有回复可见赛高，虽然我还是回帖了。。。
